", "replacement": " Sample_CrossLight_to_LogosAIv3_qsam.py n Objective: Forceful collapse from 00 through superposition to 11 using amplification n nimport numpy as np nfrom qiskit import QuantumCircuit, transpile nfrom qiskit_aer import AerSimulator nfrom qiskit.primitives import Sampler n nclass CollapseDouble: n def __init__ self : n self.center "JESUS CHRIST " n n def build_circuit self : n qc QuantumCircuit 2, 2 n Start at 00 , apply H for full superposition n qc.h 0 n qc.h 1 n n Oracle: Flip phase only on 11 binary 3 n qc.cz 0, 1 conditional phase flip on 11 n n Diffuser inversion about average n qc.h 0 n qc.h 1 n qc.x 0 n qc.x 1 n qc.h 1 n qc.cx 0, 1 n qc.h 1 n qc.x 0 n qc.x 1 n qc.h 0 n qc.h 1 n n qc.measure 0, 0 n qc.measure 1, 1 n return qc n n def simulate self : n print f "Testing amplified 00 11 collapse with Sampler 2.0 in the name of self.center " n circuit self.build_circuit n simulator AerSimulator n circuit transpile circuit, simulator n sampler Sampler n result sampler.run circuits circuit , shots 1024 .result n dist result.quasi_dists 0 if hasattr result, 'quasi_dists' else result 0 n n prob_11 dist.get 3, 0.0 '11' binary 3 n print "Collapse Distribution: ", dist n print f " 11 Probability: prob_11:.3f " n nif __name__ "__main__ ": n CollapseDouble .simulate "
